00028 /* Includes ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00029 #include "ht32.h"
00030 #include "ht32_board.h"
00031 #include "ht32_board_config.h"
00032 /** @addtogroup HT32_Series_Peripheral_Examples HT32 Peripheral Examples
00033   * @{
00034   */
00035

00042   */
00043 
00044 /* Private function prototypes -----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00045 void SCI_Configuration(void);
00046 void SCI_ReceiveTest(void);
00047 
00048 /* Private constants ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00049 #define SCI_RECEIVE_TIMEOUT   0x4000
00050 
00051 /* Private variables ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00052 vu32 Counter = 0;
00053 vu8 CardDetected = 0;
00054 vu8 ATR_Buffer[50] = {0};
00055 
00056 /* Global functions ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00057 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00058   * @brief  Main program.
00059   * @retval None
00060   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00061 int main(void)
00062 {
00063   SCI_Configuration();
00064 
00065   SCI_ReceiveTest();
00066 
00067   while (1);
00068 }
00069 
00070 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00071   * @brief  Configure the SCI.
00072   * @retval None
00073   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00074 void SCI_Configuration(void)
00075 {
00076    /* !!! NOTICE !!!
00077      Notice that the local variable (structure) did not have an initial value.
00078      Please confirm that there are no missing members in the parameter settings below in this function.
00079   */
00080   SCI_InitTypeDef SCI_InitStructure;
00081   CKCU_PeripClockConfig_TypeDef CKCUClock = {{0}};
00082   CKCUClock.Bit.AFIO                      = 1;
00083   HTCFG_SMARTCARD_CLK(CKCUClock)          = 1;
00084   HTCFG_SMARTCARD_CMD_CLK(CKCUClock)      = 1;
00085   HTCFG_SMARTCARD_RSTN_CLK(CKCUClock)     = 1;
00086   CKCU_PeripClockConfig(CKCUClock, ENABLE);
00087 
00088   /*  Configure SCI CLK, SCI DIO, SCI DET pin.                                                              */
00089   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_SMARTCARD_CLK_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_SMARTCARD_CLK_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_SCI);
00090   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_SMARTCARD_DIO_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_SMARTCARD_DIO_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_SCI);
00091   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_SMARTCARD_DET_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_SMARTCARD_DET_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_SCI);
00092 
00093   /*  Configure SmartCard interface CMD pin.                                                                */
00094   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_SMARTCARD_CMD_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_SMARTCARD_CMD_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_GPIO);
00095   GPIO_SetOutBits(GPIO_PORT[HTCFG_SMARTCARD_CMD_GPIO_ID], HTCFG_SMARTCARD_CMD_GPIO_PIN);
00096   GPIO_DirectionConfig(GPIO_PORT[HTCFG_SMARTCARD_CMD_GPIO_ID], HTCFG_SMARTCARD_CMD_GPIO_PIN, GPIO_DIR_OUT);
00097 
00098   /*  Configure SmartCard interface RSTN pin.                                                               */
00099   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_SMARTCARD_RSTN_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_SMARTCARD_RSTN_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_GPIO);
00100   GPIO_ClearOutBits(GPIO_PORT[HTCFG_SMARTCARD_RSTN_GPIO_ID], HTCFG_SMARTCARD_RSTN_GPIO_PIN);
00101   GPIO_DirectionConfig(GPIO_PORT[HTCFG_SMARTCARD_RSTN_GPIO_ID], HTCFG_SMARTCARD_RSTN_GPIO_PIN, GPIO_DIR_OUT);
00102 
00103   SCI_InitStructure.SCI_Mode = SCI_MODE_SCI;
00104   SCI_InitStructure.SCI_Retry = SCI_RETRY_NO;
00105   SCI_InitStructure.SCI_Convention = SCI_CONVENTION_DIRECT;
00106   SCI_InitStructure.SCI_CardPolarity = SCI_CARDPOLARITY_HIGH;
00107   SCI_InitStructure.SCI_ClockPrescale = SCI_CLKPRESCALER_12;    /* SCI CLK set to 48 MHz/12 = 4 MHz  */
00108   SCI_Init(HTCFG_SMARTCARD_SCI, &SCI_InitStructure);
00109 
00110   SCI_SetGuardTimeValue(HTCFG_SMARTCARD_SCI, 16);
00111   SCI_ETUConfig(HTCFG_SMARTCARD_SCI, 372, SCI_COMPENSATION_DISABLE);
00112   SCI_ClockModeConfig(HTCFG_SMARTCARD_SCI, SCI_CLK_HARDWARE);
00113 
00114   SCI_IntConfig(HTCFG_SMARTCARD_SCI, SCI_INT_PAR | SCI_INT_CARD, ENABLE);
00115   NVIC_EnableIRQ(HTCFG_SMARTCARD_IRQn);
00116 
00117   SCI_Cmd(HTCFG_SMARTCARD_SCI, ENABLE);
00118 }
00119 
00120 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00121   * @brief  SCI receive data.
00122   * @retval None
00123   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00124 void SCI_ReceiveTest(void)
00125 {
00126   u8 i;
00127   /*  Loop while no SmartCard is detected.                                                                  */
00128   while(!CardDetected);
00129 
00130   /* Get SmartCard ATR response.                                                                            */
00131   for(i = 0; i < 50; i++, Counter = 0)
00132   {
00133     while((SCI_GetFlagStatus(HTCFG_SMARTCARD_SCI, SCI_FLAG_RXC) == RESET) && (Counter != SCI_RECEIVE_TIMEOUT))
00134     {
00135       Counter++;
00136     }
00137 
00138     if(Counter != SCI_RECEIVE_TIMEOUT)
00139     {
00140       ATR_Buffer[i] = SCI_ReceiveData(HTCFG_SMARTCARD_SCI);
00141     }
00142   }
00143 }
00144 
00145 #if (HT32_LIB_DEBUG == 1)
00146 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00147   * @brief  Report both the error name of the source file and the source line number.
00148   * @param  filename: pointer to the source file name.
00149   * @param  uline: error line source number.
00150   * @retval None
00151   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00152 void assert_error(u8* filename, u32 uline)
00153 {
00154   /*
00155      This function is called by IP library that the invalid parameters has been passed to the library API.
00156      Debug message can be added here.
00157      Example: printf("Parameter Error: file %s on line %d\r\n", filename, uline);
00158   */
00159 
00160   while (1)
00161   {
00162   }
00163 }
